summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) congratulating the team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It highlights the significant effort required to build the case and announces an upcoming press conference by Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, arrested and charged with criminal conduct related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Mentioned as holding a press conference regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning on criminal charges related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Arrest
events.description: Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss held a press conference at 12:00 regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The arrest and charges were the result of extensive work, perseverance, and creativity by the prosecution team, not an inevitable outcome.
The criminal conduct underlying the case is described as being older than the paralegals in the office, indicating historical allegations.
Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss held a press conference on the day of the arrest.
The email congratulates the prosecution team for their productivity and success during quarantine conditions.
